If you\u2019re certain an SSL certificat: If you’re certain an SSL certificate is present, and refresh SSL status does not work, please check “Override SSL detection” to continue activating SSL.
SSL has been activated network wide: SSL has been activated network wide
The certificate is not generated by Real: The certificate is not generated by Really Simple SSL, so there are no installation files here
DNS verification active. You can switch: DNS verification active. You can switch back to directory verification here.
View detailed report on Qualys SSL Labs: View detailed report on Qualys SSL Labs
The SSL detection method is not 100% acc: The SSL detection method is not 100% accurate.
The CA Bundle will sometimes be automati: The CA Bundle will sometimes be automatically detected. If not, you can use this file.
The private key can be uploaded or paste: The private key can be uploaded or pasted in the appropriate field on your hosting dashboard.
This is the certificate, which you need: This is the certificate, which you need to install in your hosting dashboard.
If you're sure it's set correctly, you c: If you're sure it's set correctly, you can click the button to skip the DNS check.
You can manually check the DNS records i: You can manually check the DNS records in an %sonline tool%s.
We could not check the DNS records. If y: We could not check the DNS records. If you just added the record, please check in a few minutes.
Add the following token as text record t: Add the following token as text record to your DNS records. We recommend to use a short TTL during installation, in case you need to change it.
Inside the folder called \u201cssl\u201d: Inside the folder called “ssl” create a new folder called “certs”, with 644 writing permissions.
The certificate will get stored in this: The certificate will get stored in this directory.
Inside the folder called \u201cssl\u201d: Inside the folder called “ssl” create a new folder called “keys”, with 644 writing permissions.
Navigate in FTP or File Manager to one l: Navigate in FTP or File Manager to one level above the root of your WordPress installation:
The key directory is needed to store the: The key directory is needed to store the generated keys.
If the challenge directory cannot be cre: If the challenge directory cannot be created, you can either remove the server limitation, or change to DNS verification.
Or you can switch to DNS verification: Or you can switch to DNS verification
Inside the folder called \u201c.well-kno: Inside the folder called “.well-known” create a new folder called “acme-challenge”, with 644 writing permissions.
Navigate in FTP or File Manager to the r: Navigate in FTP or File Manager to the root of your WordPress installation:
The challenge directory is used to verif: The challenge directory is used to verify the domain ownership.
If the challenge directory cannot be cre: If the challenge directory cannot be created, or is not reachable, you can either remove the server limitation, or change to DNS verification.
Please note that auto-renewal with a DNS: Please note that auto-renewal with a DNS challenge might not be possible.
If you also want to secure subdomains li: If you also want to secure subdomains like mail.domain.com, cpanel.domain.com, you have to use the %sDNS%s challenge.
